content: If anyone here is color blind, can you contact me directly? Someone has raised the question of how the spec is for color blind people. thanks
There are multiple types of that condition - what works for one won't necessarily work for the others.
There are apps that simulate what color blind people see. I see there's also a Chrome extension which does that.
y, and I've used them. but I'm not convinced till I've heard it from some one real
@Grahame Grieve I'm red/green color blind (not total, just don't see some shades normally) - fail the Ishihara test miserably. But spec looks ok to me, fwiw.
